definition: roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]

sentences.english: The following image is the tile floor of the ship's Solarium .
sentences.chinese: 下列的图像是船的日浴室的砖瓦地板。

sentences.english: In one such project, local engineers trained masons to strengthen a school.
sentences.chinese: 在本项目中，当地的工程师被培训用砖瓦来加固学校。

sentences.english: These results provide technical bases for prevention and control of fluoride pollution from brick-kiln.
sentences.chinese: 这些结果对防治砖瓦生产中氟的污染有参考意义。

sentences.english: They had saved for a decade to build the small brick-and-tile home which crashed to the ground in minutes.
sentences.chinese: 他们攒了十年钱盖的砖瓦结构的房子几分钟就崩塌了。

sentences.english: On one side of the railway, a string of single-storey dwellings, built of brick and tile, have yet to be demolished.
sentences.chinese: 在铁道一侧，一排砖瓦单层房仍未被拆除。

sentences.english: He built a sturdy brick house there to share with his wife and son, and planted a vegetable garden with radishes, beans and okra.
sentences.chinese: 他建了一座坚固的砖瓦房，与妻子和儿子住在一起。

sentences.english: The house has a wooden frame which is braced with brick.
sentences.chinese: 这幢房子是木结构的砖瓦房。

sentences.english: These bricks was brought in gold price and sold like dung.
sentences.chinese: 这些砖瓦买进时似黄金，卖出时似粪土。

sentences.english: FY: You know, a house has its own soul, It's not just a place to live.
sentences.chinese: 你知道吗，房子是有灵性的，不知是砖瓦泥墙而已。

sentences.english: Tableware and Cutlery, Decorative Items, Hand Painted Home Accessories, Tiles, Tabletop, Bakeware , Wall Art, Trays.
sentences.chinese: 采购产品餐具，装饰的箱子，家居配件，砖瓦，桌面。

sentences.english: They have structural qualities superior to kilned brick and other masonry materials.
sentences.chinese: 比起窰砖和其它砖瓦来，它们有很好的质量。

sentences.english: In this paper, the fluorine fixing materials were chosen to control the emission of fluoride for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 首次将固氟剂应用于砖瓦厂的氟治理试验。

sentences.english: Those large curved brick tiles so characteristic of east anglia.
sentences.chinese: 反映古代东盎格里亚独特风格的大型弧线形砖瓦。

definition: to build a structure out of layered bricks or stones
